original: śrībuddha buddhādhipa buddharūpa buddhānvitān bodhayase vibuddhaḥ |
analyzed: śrī buddha buddha adhipa buddha rūpa buddha anvitān bodhayase vibuddhaḥ

original: buddhyā samastān khalu buddhaputra santoṣya yogena tu buddhameghām || 1 ||
analyzed: buddhyā samastān khalu buddha putra santoṣya yogena tu buddha meghām

original: śrīvajra vajrāmala jātavajra vajreṇa dīptena pradīpya lokam |
analyzed: śrīvajra vajra amala jāta vajra vajreṇa dīptena pradīpya lokam

original: dadan yogena tu vajrasaṃvarṣaṃ vajrātmabhāvaṃ kuruṣe suvajra || 2 ||
analyzed: dadan yogena tu vajra saṃvarṣam vajra ātma bhāvam kuruṣe su vajra

original: śrīratna ratnākara ratnamegha ratnena ratnaṃ ramase suratna |
analyzed: śrī ratna ratna ākara ratna megha ratnena ratnam ramase su ratna
vidārya janānām su tejasā ratna mahā dhvajena
śrī padma padmottama padma sattva padmān samastān khalu padma jālaiḥ

original: vibodhya padmodbhava padmatoyaiḥ padme kule sthāpayase supadma || 4 ||
analyzed: vibodhya padmodbhava padma toyaiḥ padme kule sthāpayase su padma

original: śrīviśva viśvāviśa viśvajñānaṃ viśvena viśvaviṣayena lipta |
analyzed: śrī viśva viśva āviśa viśva jñānam viśvena viśva viṣayena lipta

original: viśvena sattvān vinayeṣu viśvaṃ vidyāṃ suvidyāṃ sukhapācitāmiti || 5 ||
analyzed: viśvena sattvān vinayeṣu viśvam vidyām su vidyām sukha pāci tām iti
